nodes.text: Jennie Pickalho was a Human replica droid, designed to be an almost perfect replica of a Human female. She worked at the Chandrilan Embassy on Coruscant at the time of the destruction of Alderaan.

Jennie Pickalho was built by the Caamasi some time before 19 BBY. Miraculously escaping the Destruction of Caamas, she was sent to Mon Mothma to testify about the massacre, after the Chandrilan Senator reopened the file in 1 BBY. The Caamasi also reprogrammed the android, as they expected a direct confrontation with the murderer of their people.

Jennie Pickalho was created by Philippe Rat for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "Il faut sauver Miss Pickalho" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli HS24. She was illustrated by David Cochard.
